title: Mortgage lenders plan to raise $2 billion via overseas loans
description: Housing finance companies like PNB Housing Finance, Godrej Capital, and Hudco are exploring overseas markets to raise over $2 billion due to rising funding costs. They are also entering the affordable housing segment. Companies aim to diversify borrowing sources and reduce reliance on banks to manage costs and improve margins.
